title: REMOVE Autofill.
body:
Remove Autofill, Remove Autofill, REMOVE AUTOFILL, Re-Move Autofill, re move auto fill remove auto fill fill auto remove autofill remove autofill remove autofill.

OR

ACTUALLY BALANCE AUTOFILL SO THAT YOU DONT HAVE 3-4 AUTOFILL ON ONE TEAM AND 1 Autofill on the other team.

OR 
REMOVE AUTOFILL remove autofill remove autofill.

replies.body:
Yeah i hate autofill. it destroys a game that could of been competitive. 
There is nothing fun about causing a lose and getting flamed for it when your autofilled.
They should remove autofill i hate autofill!
Ikr, autofill is trash and is so lame, i would rather wait 10 minutes to get a game with no autofill than get a 30s queue pop and have 3 autofill on my team!
